lines.text: I've got a scoop for you, Walter. Senator Taft is a horse's aft.
The face of fear is coming. And when it comes, Walter, you'll answer to no one, not even me.
But he's HITLER! You're only Walter Winchell.
That's where you're wrong. I'm Walter Winchell, he's only Hitler.
Hitler hates me. He hates me!
Yeah, well, Joe Stalin hasn't sent me a Christmas card either.
Mr. Mayor, my column gave you this office, and it can take it away.
Good evening, Mr. and Mrs. North and South America and all the ships at sea! Let's go to press!
